name: Orca Security
description: Orca Security provides comprehensive cloud-native security solutions, enabling organizations to secure their entire cloud environment with ease and efficiency.
targetAudience: CIOs, security teams, IT managers, compliance officers
products: Cloud security platform, vulnerability management, compliance monitoring, runtime protection, cloud workload protection
benefits: Holistic visibility across cloud environments, reduced risk of breaches, streamlined compliance processes, improved incident response times
geoSpecificity: Global, with a focus on North America and Europe
